name: Predictive Beat Flash
description: Zero-latency beat flash using tempo confidence prediction. Instant white flash on beat detection with exponential decay.
artistic_intent: Leverages 15-20ms latency for perceptually instant beat response. Center-origin flash radiates outward.

nodes.description: CENTER-ORIGIN: distance from center (0 at center, 1 at edges)
Auto-detect strongest beat with high sensitivity
Square beat signal for sharper attack
Cube for explosive flash (x^3 response curve)
Compress position range for tighter flash radius
Beat flash intensity radiates from center
White flash at center, purple decay at edges
